text: Enywe abasuubila, mwalachilwa okhurunga imongo (kisasi) khubalia bererwe, omulekhuule khumulekhuule, omusumba khumusumba, ne omukhasi khu mukhasi, ne uleshelwa nende owashie shiosishiosi kho alondwekho omuhe khubulayi, naye arunge obulayi, okho ni okhwanguyilibwa okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu omulesi. Ne ularuuma eshichelo nikhwakhamala kano, alaba nende eshinyasio eshilulu
